items.name: ATTENTION MOD AUTHORS
items.summary: In an attempt to curb gigantic update messages moving everyone several pages up, we are asking you to keep your announcements __short__ like this template:
items.description:
In an attempt to curb gigantic update messages moving everyone several pages up, we are asking you to keep your announcements __short__ like this template:




**NAME OF THE MOD version**

```A few words
To describe the mod or the update
That's it!```

**Direct Download** __<www.no_preview_link_A.com>__
**Nexus** __<www.no_preview_link_B.com>__
**Forum**  __<www.no_preview_link_C.com>__
```A single horizontal image```




On the other hand, __**threads have been enabled**__ to modders that wish to post more screenshots and long changelogs along their update. Messages that are needlessly long will be removed. 

We are also reminding you that you should only have a single post per mod so that only the most recent version is available, please remember to delete old announcements after updating.

items.name: Blackrock Drive Yards Unofficial Balance Add-On
items.summary: *Look ma, my own post!* ~~shameful mod_info fix~~ edition.
items.description:
*Look ma, my own post!* ~~shameful mod_info fix~~ edition.

Rebalances Blackrock mod to bring it in line with Starsector 0.96 and other modded factions. It's not too crazy, just comfy. Highlights:
> Nerfs to Vespa and Fury Torpedo speed, no longer insta-impact torpedo bombers
> Weapon tweaks, making BRDY weapons more competitive in their niches without being better in *every* niche
> Ship price tweaks
Now works again!

items.name: CH ROUND EVEN V0.1
items.summary: ```Changes a single line of code in converted hangers to make more fighters viable options for the converted hanger.
items.description:
```Changes a single line of code in converted hangers to make more fighters viable options for the converted hanger.

- Fighters like the warthog + gladius were at perfect tresholds to get the worse DP nerfs than popular strong fighters like thunders/broadswords. These already weren't popular, so them being at the exact worst thresholds for the hullmod hurt.

- The mod adds a rounding behavior to converted hanger so the worst fighters more generally have a DP cost that closer to what good fighters got. So you can experiment more and worry less.```

items.name: Price of Command
items.summary:
Adds fatigue and injury mechanics to your officers.
To compensate for the increased demands this puts on your officers, officers are now cheaper to hire, pay, and are more numerous. Additionally, you can now have a greater number on your roster.
items.description:
Adds fatigue and injury mechanics to your officers.
To compensate for the increased demands this puts on your officers, officers are now cheaper to hire, pay, and are more numerous. Additionally, you can now have a greater number on your roster.
Mod authors may be interested in implementing their own "conditions" like fatigue and injuries. A number of methods are available for other mod authors to hook into.
```
Requires:
LazyLib, MagicLib, LunaLib
Optional:
Console Commands - Lets you inflict and heal the conditions currently in the mod, as well as just kill an officer (but why?)
```
***Not balanced AT ALL***
